[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@fizz/ui-components](./ui-components.md) &gt; [Overlay](./ui-components.overlay.md)

## Overlay class

The foundation for interactive dialogs -- a simple overlay with an optional 'X' close button. Provides a single slot for content.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Overlay extends LitElement 
```
**Extends:** LitElement

</td><td>


</td><td>

{ key: boolean; button: boolean; click: boolean; }


</td><td>

Enables or disables ways in which the user can cancel (i.e., hide) the overlay. key = Hitting the Esc key button = Clicking the X button click = Clicking outside of the overlay
